text: 2021 TAF AS532 crash took place on 4 March 2021, when a Turkish Air Force (TAF) Eurocopter AS532 Cougar going to Tatvan District in Bitlis, Turkey, crashed in Bitlis Province. Eleven Turkish servicemen on board were killed in the crash, while two other servicemen survived the crash. It was the fourth incident in Turkey involving the particular model of aircraft, which has caused the deaths of 39 people, including two high-ranking military officers. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Asia Category:2021 in Turkey Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in Asia Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2021 Category:March 2021 events
title: 2021 TAF AS532 crash
